64b0e35f-f9d0-44d0-a9f0-a2f281caac87.text:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) are systems that can perform 
tasks typically requiring human intelligence. These tasks 
include visual perception, speech recognition, decision-
making, and language translation.

27c1ab09-08d0-4f19-82b7-f058a05e2a5f.text:

forecast demand, set 
dynamic pricing, and 
optimize routes.

167773fd-478d-4d99-8b02-5ea8e18a59b2.text:
Tens of millions of dollars 
in savings and revenue
Efficiency and Automation, Data-Driven Decision-Making, Enhanced Customer 
Experience, Innovation and Competitive Edge

e8c23ab0-f207-4f0d-806b-bfa24b7a5939.text:
Need for Skilled Personnel
•A significant talent gap in AI exists, with companies across all industries 
struggling to secure top AI talent from a limited pool. •Deloitte's research found that even the most mature AI adopters face 
challenges in finding the necessary skills, with 23% reporting a major or 
extreme talent gap

b9c42631-9dcf-4b95-8d86-b8927a47f6c2.text:
Strategic Implementation
•The strategic implementation of AI requires not just technological 
capability but also a clear vision and understanding of AI's potential 
impact on the business. •EY's study indicates that alongside skilled personnel, a lack of compelling 
ROI (27%), management understanding (24%), and unclear business cases 
(21%) are significant barriers to AI adoption

3e8602a7-3f5c-4d26-9c33-5b2a22cc8217.text:
Data Privacy and Ethical Considerations
•As AI technologies become more integrated into business operations, 
concerns around data privacy and ethical use of AI are increasingly 
coming to the forefront. •Ensuring compliance with data protection regulations and addressing 
ethical dilemmas posed by AI applications are critical considerations for 
businesses aiming to responsibly leverage AI

f205823d-3695-44d5-b39a-65879c921cc9.text:
What can we expect in the next 
2 years?

9e3d61ea-e358-487b-8b6c-0fe95b82a342.text:
Cheaper, Faster and 
Better
Several new AI-driven business models are now possible because of these 3. Add the growing number of 
open-source models, the time from idea to production has never been shorter. Revenue margins are huge, 
it’s easy to have 90% margin.

c07d473b-c7a0-4568-a205-ed39740daf8f.text:
A tissue paper calculation
-  Example: OpenAI's gpt-3.5-turbo charges $0.002 per 1,000 tokens (1 
token ≈ 0.75 words). - For a user requiring 500 words/min, the hourly cost is roughly $0.08. - Perceived value matters: If users see a $1/hour value, you're looking at a 
~92% margin (considering negligible server costs with scale).

83449975-9d83-408e-93ce-50d1aef8af65.text:
Case Study: How a GPT-3.5 wrapper company 
founded in 2022 reached a $520M valuation?

product look like? Beta release components

90ac31d2-1eca-4180-9296-c0b9118adb50.text:
Getting Started with AI in Your 
Business

5b1f0792-93e0-4bcd-b263-afc46ba2eaad.text:
Identify AI Opportunities
-Get some domain expertise
-Notice usual problems
-Imagine a futuristic solution ala sci-fi movie
-“What problem is now soluble because of *new 
tech* that was impossible before? ”
Build Fast
-Learn to code
-Get a technical co founder
-Use boilerplate code, no-code
-Use open-source code
-Keep it simple. 1-page, 1-feature
Know what to measure
-Don’t fool yourself with vanity metrics
-Most probably a metric that has direct 
impact to revenue is what you want
Distribute and get feedback
-Organic before paid
-Find fb groups, slack, discord and subreddit that 
will benefit with your product
-If B2B in Japan, get a Japanese business 
partner
An error-correcting 
journey

fed8fac4-b042-4b81-bdee-b087f523022d.text:
JimakuAI
The journey so far
•Oct 2022, Started as a weekend project when OpenAI released Whisper, a 
SOTA speech-to-text model 
•Mar 2023, Quit my tech lead job and incorporated JimakuAI 
•May 2023, Got my first B2B client 
•Oct 2023, Released B2C app 
•Dec 2023, 1st long-term contract closed, Accepted AI consulting gig, 
made a new product during holidays  
•Will keep building new products every month while doing AI consulting
